channel.title: 乙炔银硝酸银复合盐的合成
channel.description:
http://www.sciencemadness.org/talk/viewthread.php?tid=15356
Silver acetylide can be produced by passing acetylene gas through a solution of silver nitrate: 2 AgNO<sub>3</sub> (aq) + C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>2</sub> (g) → Ag<sub>2</sub>C<sub>2</sub> (s) + 2 HNO<sub>3</sub> (aq) The reaction product is a greyish to white precipitate. This is the same synthesis from Berthelot in which he first found silver acetylide in 1866.

item.title: 乙炔银硝酸银复合盐的合成
item.dc:creator: azide
item.description:
http://www.sciencemadness.org/talk/viewthread.php?tid=15356

Silver acetylide can be produced by passing acetylene gas through a solution of silver nitrate:
2 AgNO3 (aq) + C2H2 (g) → Ag2C2 (s) + 2 HNO3 (aq)
The reaction product is a greyish to white precipitate. This is the same synthesis from Berthelot in which he first found silver acetylide in 1866.

阅读完整话题
item.source: 乙炔银硝酸银复合盐的合成
